title: Arm
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109033937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109033937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Arm**

The projecting horizontal [stroke](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109033937/http:/typophile.com/wiki/stroke) on such letters as **T** , **E**.
author: paul d hunt
